attributes.additional_details: All reference to PC and multiculturalism to be banned as in the words of Roy Jenkins who coined the phrase says he wishes he hadn't as it is a barrier to integration. It causes division among communities and destroys the whole concept of freedom of speech which is the corner stone of any democracy. It is multiculturalism which allowed all the cases of Asian peadophile child exploitation to flourish in Rochdale, Rotherham etc.
